page.title: 16An Adult's Typical Day
page.content: My Mum gets up at the same time as I.She gets our lunches while I get the breakfast.When we go to school she watches breakfast television,then she takes the dog for a walk.When she gets back she does the housework,such as hoovering,washing-up and making beds.At 11.30am she starts making the dinner for when Dad comes home at 12.00.On Tuesdays she goes to Scunthorpe and the Asda supermarket and we pick her up at 4.30pm to go home.On other days she does more housework.Later in the afternoon she watches the television.When Dad brings us home she makes tea.Afterwards she comes to play cricket or football with us.Then we watch television until we go to bed.
